details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - CreationDate and xmp:CreateDate
details.description: The value of CreationDate entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property "xmp:CreateDate" shall be equivalent

rule.description: The value of CreationDate entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property "xmp:CreateDate" shall be equivalent

error.message: The value of CreationDate entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property "xmp:CreateDate" are not equivalent (Info /CreationDate = %1, XMP xmp:CreateDate = %2)
